title: Oreo Oration FAQ, Video Response Compilation, Thank You Video
description:
We've been reviewing Oreo cookies for quite some time. Now, Oreo Oration answers your burning questions, shows you the best video responses so far, and gives you a great big "thanks."

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your Oreo review as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

Today's special episode featured the following Video Responses. Go watch them!

ArmyGuns89: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GiYyhL3mKkQ

altoman107: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wYuhyMU4TCg

Blaire Byhower: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9gHadM-s1I

CptOppositional: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ok0_3tjXk34

grambofirstblood: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2HBXW_8ueg

theknapkins: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6RhH__FKDU

Whatthetechchannel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=05ia-tQxJ8g

transcript_chunks.text: [ Music] what's up everybody Welcome to a very special non-episode of Oreo Oration. I'm Greg Miller and of course this is Oreo Oration , a show where I review every different type of Oreo here in these United States. I wanted to do a quick Monday video for you. Not, don't worry , you're still getting your Wednesday and Friday episode of Oration, but I just wanted to drop your line and say thank you so much for supporting the show . Uh, obviously we are up into the teens now of episodes. We still have a lot of more Oreos to come, a lot more, a lot more Oreos are coming. Uh, your support has been overwhelming. I want to thank you for all the views, all the comments, all the video responses. I'm going to link to a bunch of them here at the end and show some clips from them. Thank you so much for putting those in. But I wanted to drop a line, you know, we're we're getting ready to film the second giant bunch. I get the same questions every time we come up on Oreo Orations though, so I wanted to tackle some of those.

I wanted to thank them so much for their support in that one instance because question number one on the Oreo FAQ, it's submitted by Bill Nolan, are you sponsored by Oreo? Uh, Oreo does, I'm not an Oreo hat. If they want me real quick, Oreo's watching, you want me to sell out? Done. You want me to, if you want to pay me to review your Oreos, I'm hands down, but no, no money is exchanged hands here.
